title: Can I use my keyboard to navigate the Grammarly browser extension?
content:
Grammarly's browser extension supports keyboard navigation. To open the Grammarly assistant, please use the following key combination:
On Mac:
Shift
+
Ctrl
+
Cmd
+
G
On Windows:
Shift
+
Ctrl
+
Alt
+
G
To close the assistant, press
Esc
.
You can change this configuration in your settings anytime.
Additionally, to move to the next interactive element, press
Tab
. To return to the previous interactive element, press
Shift
+
Tab
. To activate a link or a button, press
Enter
or
Space
.
